R.nebivolol
SIGNATURE .AANK AND DEGREE
EOTIONOFJAN.60 MAY 8EUSED FOR
S/N 0102-LF-012-5201

medical_explanations.nebivolol: it acts as an anti-hypertensive agent and has been shown in many studies that the drug reduces blood pressure (BP) by blocking β adrenergic receptors on vascular smooth muscle cells of large arteries.
